content.text:
Let me analyze the two structures in the main target image and provide assembly instructions for each.

Left Structure Analysis:
- Cross-shaped base with a blue center and four orange triangular roofs
- Consists of a central blue cube with 4 orange sloped pieces on sides and a central orange column with roof
- Total of 6 pieces: 1 blue cube, 4 orange triangular roofs, 1 orange tower piece with roof

Right Structure Analysis:
- Two orange columns with yellow rectangular bases and top
- Has 5 pieces: 2 yellow horizontal rectangles, 2 orange vertical columns, 1 orange triangular roof

Assembly Instructions:

For Left Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
    Step2: Move block with index 13 (orange triangular piece)
    Step3: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular piece)
    Step4: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular piece)
    Step5: Move block with index 16 (orange triangular piece)
    Step6: Move block with index 6 (orange vertical column)
    Step7: Move block with index 11 (orange roof piece)
}

For Right Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 3 (yellow horizontal rectangle)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (orange vertical column)
    Step3: Move block with index 6 (orange vertical column)
    Step4: Move block with index 3 (yellow horizontal rectangle)
    Step5: Move block with index 11 (orange roof piece)
}
